channel.title: CVE Feed for AB-WP -- Simple Counter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AB-WP -- Simple Counter

item.title: CVE-2023-50377|2023-12-21T14:30:19.186Z -- ab-wp -- simple%20counter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AB-WP Simple Counter allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Counter: from n/a through 1.0.2.
